definitions.definition: A person who carries a cross in a religious procession , a cross bearer .
A member of the family Cruciferae ( Brassicaceae ), the cabbage family , including cabbage and mustard .

main_definition: ( Christianity ) A person who carries a cross in a religious procession , a cross bearer .
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) A member of the family Cruciferae ( Brassicaceae ), the cabbage family , including cabbage and mustard .
